long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser Shortcuts has every shortcut you need in the your browser. This practical and useful tool gives you instant access to not so obvious options of Chrome browser with live weather and also custom backgrounds. 

The Installation of this extension will configure your New Tab Page to Browser Shortcuts. Browser Shortcuts extension is all you need to start browsing with quick access to popular widgets and sites. Customize your background and brighten your day.
